attributes.action: support FSA in Bank Charges Claims...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: support the thousands of Claimants who have been unfairly charged by their high street Banks...to make Banks more accessible and accountable to customers needs in particular to those that have satisfied Bank Charge Criteria. To Publicly support each claimant in their efforts to claim back extortionate charges by high street banks. Support for the legal challenge against the Banks, with Legislation to enforce them to pay back any subsequent charges incurred.
